title: Making a Technology Investment Decision
prompt: Check, if the technology TECHNOLOGYNAME is worth investing in. Create a list of pros and cons and make a decision.

title: Scaffold of Swift database application
prompt: Create the scaffold for a database oriented application for iOS that loads data from a table named TABLENAME and displays the rows in a List.

title: Write Swift Unit Tests
prompt: Create the unit tests for all viewmodel and model methods.
